author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cases were filed against All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam functionaries for alleged election code violations here on Tuesday.

Police said that cases were filed against Palani AIADMK town secretary Muruganandham and district students’ wing secretary Anwaruddhin for erecting a dais for a public meeting blocking the road in the town on Monday evening.

Special flying squad would monitor poll code violations by all political parties, they added.
title: Cases against AIADMK men
